meanings.definition: A family of marine fishes including sea breams and porgies.
meanings.sent1: Sparids are colorful fish found in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of sparids swimming near the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sparids organize a talent show? To see who had the best scales!
meanings.sent4: The sparids shimmered like jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh sparids.

meanings.definition: Any fish of the family Sparidae.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium has a diverse collection of sparids.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen enjoy catching sparids for their tasty meat.
meanings.sent3: What did the sparids say to the crab? 'You're shell-fish!'
meanings.sent4: The sparids darted through the water like silver arrows.
meanings.sent5: Children love watching sparids swim gracefully in the tank.
